title: How to Make Easy Money in Fallout 3

steps.headline: Stack up on ordinance.
steps.description: Find a decent amount of ammo, a melee weapon(s), firearms, Stimpaks  and Nuka-Colas or other food. These can be purchased, stolen or found in Springvale Elementary School adjacent to Megaton (though this isn't recommended at a low level, because the raiders could kill you before you can get them).

steps.headline: Kill all of the Raiders in the school.
steps.description: No mercy. Just run around, fire, smash, etc., until you've cleared a small area. Use small breaks in the firefights to heal up, grab enemy possessions or reload.

steps.headline: Look around.
steps.description: The Raiders won't have ALL of the most valuable loot. Just take a look around; it is recommended that you grab Nuka-Colas, ammo, Conductors, Wonderglue, Bottle caps...Basically, anything worth a decent amount whilst not being too heavy for the price.

steps.headline: Go back.
steps.description: Either fast travel or run back to Megaton or the trade caravan usually beside it.

steps.headline: Sell.
steps.description: Sell away all of the raider armor/helmets, low-condition weapons that can't be repaired, chems, etc.

steps.headline: Repeat.
steps.description: Restock ammo and repair as much as you can and try again on another Raider hideout if you want.

steps.headline: Get a lot of weapons and save them for later: this one is a glitch on the game, a really good glitch.
steps.description: First go to supply create shop in Megaton. Then look in the shop keeper's inventory, then if you have two same weapons on your inventory sell both of them to her (and make sure they vary in price). Then exit out of the inventory list. Get on it again and buy the cheapest one. After that, when you look at the weapon you bought, it is fully repaired and very valuable.

steps.headline: Steal.
steps.description: Steal everything in Megaton after you leave the Vault (unless you are a good character of course). Alcoholic items are some of the most valuable common items. Also when you are in the Vault, take your time and gather everything. Make sure to leave nothing behind.
